Package org.csstudio.platform.security

Interface Summary
IActivationAdapter The interface for all ActivationAdapter.
IAuthorizationProvider Provides access to the rights of users and actions.
ILoginCallbackHandler Retrieves the username and password that will be used to authenticate the user.
ILoginModule A LoginModule provides a particular type of authentication.
ISecurityListener This interface must be implemented by a class that want to react on security events.
 

Class Summary
AbstractExecuteable Abstract super class for executables.
ActivationService This class (de-)activates the registered objects if the current user has the permission for the id of the object.
Credentials Objects of this class are used to pass a user's username and password from an ILoginCallbackHandler to a ILoginModule.
LoginCallbackHandlerProxy Represents the Login Callback Proxy for any login callback handlers that are enumerated through the enumerator located in the utility class.
Right Defines a right for the CSS core security system.
RightSet A RightSet consists of an amount of Rights and a name.
SecurityEvent This is a superclass for all events that need a message with a timestamp.
SecurityFacade This Service executes instances of AbstractExecuteable if the current user has the permission to run them.
User This interface must be implemented by any user-instance.
